assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: ALG serves on a scientific advisory board for Tevard Biosciences, and consults for Praxis Precision Medicines. ALG receives grant funding from Tevard Biosciences, Praxis Precision Medicines, and Neurocrine Biosciences for unrelated work. AMJMvdM received funding from Schedule 1 Therapeutics and Praxis Precision Medicines for unrelated work. The other authors declare no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All subjects were consented to participate in this research study through protocols approved by local ethics boards.

funder.name: U.S. Department of Health & Human Services | National Institutes of Health
